response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. We are currently offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750,000, a generous discount considering its unparalleled quality and capabilities. We believe this represents an outstanding opportunity for you to acquire a piece that could potentially be invaluable to you. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
